entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
